title: Treadmill
description: A versatile machine for running or walking indoors. Adjustable speeds and inclines.

title: Dumbbells
description: A pair of free weights ideal for strength training. Various weights available.

title: Yoga Mat
description: A comfortable and non-slip mat for yoga and other floor exercises.

title: Kettlebell
description: A weight with a handle for full-body workouts. Great for swings and squats.

title: Stationary Bike
description: An indoor bike for cardio workouts. Adjustable resistance and seat height.

title: Resistance Bands
description: Elastic bands for strength training and rehabilitation. Comes in different resistance levels.

title: Rowing Machine
description: A machine that simulates rowing for a full-body workout. Adjustable resistance.

imageAlt: A medicine ball being thrown down
title: Medicine Ball
description: A weighted ball used for strength training and coordination exercises.

title: Foam Roller
description: A cylindrical foam tool for muscle recovery and massage. Helps relieve tension.

title: Elliptical Machine
description: A machine for low-impact cardio workouts. Combines the motions of running and climbing.

title: Weight Bench
description: A sturdy bench for weight lifting. Adjustable for different exercises.

imageAlt: A person using a pull-up bar
title: Pull-Up Bar
description: A bar for performing pull-ups and chin-ups. Can be mounted in doorways.

title: Exercise Ball
description: A large inflatable ball for stability and core exercises. Various sizes available.

title: Jump Rope
description: A simple tool for cardio workouts. Adjustable length and comfortable handles.

imageAlt: A person using an ab roller
title: Ab Roller
description: A wheel with handles for ab exercises. Helps strengthen the core.

title: Punching Bag
description: A heavy bag for boxing and martial arts training. Durable and sturdy.

title: Power Tower
description: A multi-functional piece of equipment for pull-ups, dips, and leg raises.

title: Battle Ropes
description: Heavy ropes for high-intensity interval training. Builds strength and endurance.

title: Squat Rack
description: A sturdy rack for squats and other weight lifting exercises. Adjustable height.

title: Barbell
description: A long bar used with weight plates for various strength training exercises.

title: Adjustable Dumbbells
description: Dumbbells with adjustable weights for versatile strength training.

imageAlt: Someone using a lat pulldown machine
title: Lat Pulldown Machine
description: A machine for upper body strength training. Targets the back and shoulders.

imageAlt: A leg press machine being used
title: Leg Press Machine
description: A machine for leg strength training. Adjustable resistance for different levels.

title: Smith Machine
description: A guided barbell system for weight lifting. Provides stability and safety.

title: Stepper
description: A compact machine for step workouts. Adjustable resistance levels.

title: Sandbag
description: A versatile tool for strength and endurance training. Adjustable weight.

imageAlt: Someone using a TRX suspension trainer
title: TRX Suspension Trainer
description: A suspension training system for full-body workouts. Portable and easy to use.

title: Bosu Ball
description: A half exercise ball for balance training and core workouts. Can be used both sides.

title: Ankle Weights
description: Weights that strap around the ankles for added resistance during workouts.

title: Glute Ham Developer
description: A machine for strengthening the glutes and hamstrings. Adjustable for different users.

imageAlt: Someone with a weight lifting belt on their waist
title: Weight Lifting Belt
description: A belt to support the lower back during heavy lifting. Adjustable size.

title: Plyo Box
description: A sturdy box for plyometric training. Available in different heights.

title: Weight Plates
description: Plates that add resistance to barbells and other equipment. Various weights available.

title: Hyperextension Bench
description: A bench for back and core strengthening exercises. Adjustable angles.
